title: How do I view the TalkBand B2's Bluetooth address on my phone?
answer:
To view your TalkBand B2's Bluetooth address on an iPhone: Touch Setting>General > About > Huawei B2. 

 To view your TalkBand B2's Bluetooth address on an Android phone: Sign in to the Huawei Wear application, touch the strap icon in the upper left corner to enter the settings menu. The Bluetooth address is displayed at the bottom of the settings menu under Restore factory settings.
